title: Covid-19 Live Updates: Battleground States Where Virus Is Raging Could Decide the Election
brief: More than 93,000 cases were announced across the country on Monday, the second-highest total of the pandemic. Dr. Deborah Birx, the White House coronavirus coordinator, urged officials in a private memo to pursue a more aggressive approach, contradicting President Trump.
